transcript.speaker: Agent
transcript.text: Good afternoon, this is Paul speaking, how can I help you?

transcript.speaker: Caller
transcript.text: My internet connection keep breaking up, I am unable to work from home and it is really frustrating!

transcript.speaker: Agent
transcript.text: I'm sorry to hear that, can you please state your customer id?

transcript.speaker: Agent
transcript.text: Ok, thank you, let me look you up.
